messages.title: Thumbs up for Adrian
messages.content: Adrian Sanders has a record of standing up for local people and campaigning successfully for Torbay.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Adrian wants to finish the job he started and permanently reduce South West water charges to no more than the national average. A £150 saving per household.
Adrian's re-election will help cut taxes for low earners rather than for millionaires.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Chance for Every Child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Adrian supports smaller class sizes and better links to university courses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will make taxes fairer. No-one will pay tax on the first £10,000 they earn – cutting most tax bills by £700 – and helping get the economy going again.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will make taxes fairer... helping get the economy going again.
issues.education: Adrian supports smaller class sizes and better links to university courses.

leaflet.personalStatement: I still live in Paignton with Alison, my wife, and our two dogs. We shop locally and use the same services as everyone else.

endorsements.endorsement: Adrian Sanders helps local people get things done and is the best MP we've ever had.

quotes.text: Adrian Sanders helps local people get things done and is the best MP we've ever had.

images.caption: Adrian and supporters giving thumbs up
